title: Advanced Rate of Change Limiter
name: LGF_LimRateOfChangeAdvancedCI
description: Limits the rate of change of an input variable with various operating modes.

input.name: autoValue
input.description: Signal to be processed and limited in its rate of change

input.name: posUpRateLim
input.description: Rate of change per second for the rising ramp in the positive value range

input.name: posDownRateLim
input.description: Rate of change per second for the falling ramp in the positive value range

input.name: negUpRateLim
input.description: Rate of change per second for the rising ramp in the negative value range

input.name: negDownRateLim
input.description: Rate of change per second for the falling ramp in the negative value range

input.name: defaultOutValue
input.description: Value for pre-assignment of the output variable

output.name: posUpRateLim
output.description: Rise limitation in positive range tripped

output.name: posDownRateLim
output.description: Down rate limit in positive range reached

output.name: negUpRateLim
output.description: Up rate limit in negative range reached

output.name: negDownRateLim
output.description: Down rate limit in negative range reached

output.name: error
output.description: Error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: subfunctionStatus
output.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks

user_defined_types.name: LGF_typeNonLinSetpoints
user_defined_types.description: Data type for setup a setpoint table for function

description_zh:
该函数块FB用于限制输入变量的变化速率，具有多种操作模式。它能够处理并限制输入信号的变化速率，提供手动控制输出值，以及限制在正值和负值范围内的上升和下降斜率。此外，它还能够设置高限制值和低限制值，并提供默认输出值。该函数块支持自动模式、手动模式和跟踪模式，并能够在出现错误时进行重启。它还能够调用周期性中断组织块（OB）以进行唤醒警报。

在自动模式下，函数块会根据设定的上升和下降速率限制以及周期时间来计算输出值。如果输入值超出了设定的速率限制，输出值将会被限制在最大或最小允许值内。在手动模式下，输出值将由手动控制值决定。在跟踪模式下，输出值将会跟随输入值的变化。

该函数块还包括了错误处理和状态代码，以便在出现错误时进行诊断。状态代码包括完成且无错误、负速率限制错误、负速率变化错误、查询CINT错误和OB不可用错误。
